response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value to me. This item is not just a possession; it's a testament to craftsmanship and a symbol of excellence. I believe its true worth surpasses $1,000,000, but considering the current market conditions and my desire to make this transaction beneficial for both parties, I am offering it to you at a special price of $950,000. Please let me know if this proposition aligns with your interests and budget. I look forward to your response.", "product_price": 950000}
